title: When you Proc Braum's Passive with Jhin's 4th Shot

replies.body: # [ FOUR INTENSIFIES ]

ruining time:
not actually an effective strategy. more effective to proc braum's passive with the third shot for the extra missing health damage on the fourth and a still target.
The trade off for the up-front damage is that they're stunned while you're reloading, minimizing the damage difference in that time.
TFW rekt
well arent u supposed to w then e them after the 4th shot?
more effective strat is if jihn is just ulting a stunned target from halfway across the screen that braum autoed to less than 50% health.
rekt m8
What is this image and why do I want it framed and on my wall

The "when ___ just right" is a recent meme that has rapidly gained popularity. look out for other edits of the same base image, originating from the Emperor's New Groove, likely due to the effective depiction of satisfaction.
I was about to say "it's not recent", but then I realized it's really only been around for 3 months.
To be fair, that's not new in Internet terms.
